name: My Empress Apprentice is Becoming Evil
author: The Cloud Cat
content: This book will never abuse the protagonist, the system is just a tool. Travel through the fantasy world! Become the master of the empress before she turned evil. The little apprentice who was abused in every way suddenly found that her master became gentle and powerful, and became more and more hard-mouthed and soft-hearted towards her... Su Changge: Damn system, I donâ€™t want to be a scumbag villain! System: Born as a scumbag, destined to be a villain! Feng Wanqing: What should I do if I like my
